verses.name: Psalms 86:12
verses.text: I will praise thee, O Lord my God, with all my heart: and I will glorify thy name for evermore.

verses.name: Psalms 86:13
verses.text: For great is thy mercy toward me: and thou hast delivered my soul from the lowest hell.

verses.name: Psalms 86:14
verses.text: O God, the proud are risen against me, and the assemblies of violent men have sought after my soul; and have not set thee before them.

verses.name: Psalms 86:15
verses.text: But thou, O Lord, art a God full of compassion, and gracious, longsuffering, and plenteous in mercy and truth.
